attributes.action: David Cameron to step down as Prime Minister for not putting Britain First.
attributes.additional_details: Clearly the word "negotiations" does not relate in any form to these EU talks that have taken place. This action has been deceitful and an insult to the intelligence of the British people and we the undersigned request to the Tory party that David Cameron is removed from his role as Prime Minister as we no longer have the confidence in his leadership of Great Britain.
attributes.background: Request David Cameron to step down as Prime Minister for not representing Britain's interests first and foremost in EU negotiations.

rejection.details: The resignation of the Prime Minister (or any individual Minister) is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
